whitelisted_desc.text_2: Enjoy seamless transactions with your preferred coin and secure your share of the token sale at -43% to TGE Price. Stage availability is limited.

transactions.title: Transactions

faq.title: When Can I Purchase Tokens?
faq.content: You can purchase tokens immediately through the current Stage 4. Use Ethereum, BNB Chain, or Base to complete your purchase.

faq.title: When Will I Receive My Tokens?
faq.content: Tokens will be distributed according to the vesting schedule. Initial unlocks will occur at the Token Generation Event (TGE), with further unlocks following the vesting timeline to prevent sudden token supply pressure.

faq.title: Why Antix Tokens?
faq.content: Antix tokens are the key to accessing the future of digital avatars and decentralized ownership. By holding Antix tokens, you'll participate in the growth of a platform that will disrupt the $178.5 billion digital human avatar market by enabling users to create, customize, and monetize avatars. The more the platform grows, the higher the demand for Antix tokens will be.

faq.title: Will ANTIX Token Price Grow?
faq.content: As more users join the platform and demand for digital avatars increases, the utility of ANTIX tokens will grow. Tokens will be needed for creating, customizing, and trading avatars as well as for accessing premium features. This growing demand, along with limited token supply, positions Antix tokens for value appreciation in the future.

faq.title: More Questions?
faq.content: Feel free to reach out to our support via the Telegram bot for any inquiries or further details about the token sale.

referral.title: Referral

promote.title: Thank уоu for choosing to promote Antix!
promote.line_1: Earn up to 10% USDT (BNB Chain) rewards via your referral link!

referral.invite: Invite Your Friend and Earn Rewards
referral.connected: Users who connected their crypto wallet via your link.
referral.referralVested: Vested Antix tokens purchased using your referral link.
referral.disclaimer: Rewards will be available after the current stage is finished. The next payout will happen once Stage 2 ends.

faq.title: How do I get bonuses for purchases made through a referral link?
faq.content: To get bonuses, a user must click on your referral link and connect their wallet for the first time. If a user has already connected their wallet using a regular link, they will not be able to receive bonuses if they make a purchase through a referral link.

faq.title: What happens if I've already connected my wallet using a regular link and then click on a referral link?
faq.content: If you've already connected your wallet using a regular link, you will not be able to receive bonuses if you make a purchase through a referral link. To get bonuses, you must connect your wallet using a referral link for the first time.

faq.title: Who receives bonuses if I signed up through someone else's link?
faq.content: If you signed up through someone else's link, bonuses for all purchases will go to the creator of that link.

faq.title: Can I reconnect my wallet using a referral link if I've already connected it using a regular link?
faq.content: No, wallets that were previously connected using a referral link cannot be referred by someone else, even if they are reconnected using a referral link.
